subsection_name: u-tuy-song.json_8_How to prevent spinal cord tumors?
subsection_content:
Aside from radiation exposure, there is usually no specific cause (lifestyle-related or environmental) that can cause brain and spinal cord tumors. Therefore, the best way is to recognize spinal cord tumor symptoms early for timely examination and effective treatment. (4)
